message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This feels like a fair deal considering the product's value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
